Posts.Content: snoozles59 wrote: Hi folks Went to see my BS at the end of november for results of my mammagram and ultra sound, he said that he wasnt concerned but nothing had shown up on the ultrasound and a small area had shown on the mamagram he said wasnt concerned but they had recomended i have another mamagram that did different images , ,i had that on the 2nd December and was waiting for a letter from the BS with results as he woudnt need to see me again as he thought it was just a fatty lump . Well today i had a phone call from the hospital asking me if i could go in for a biopsy on thursday morning it was a complette shock to me as i have not heard from my BS ,They put me through to the BC nurse who explained the results had come back from the 2nd mamagram they were concerned  and that i had to have the biopsy done while having the mamagram they had sent a letter out and had tried to phone me last week but couldnt leave a message on the anwerphone they  think the letter has been held up in the xmas post.I am so worried as thought from what my BS said it was all over and done with . Im worried about this being done, about waiting for the results  about everything, christmas wont be the same now with this hanging over me Big hugs for everyone snoozles Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: back and worried snoozles59 cycle-path

Posts.Content: Sep 23, 2011 07:56PM snoozles59 wrote: Thankyou both for your responce and support ,  am trying to keep busy this weekend but keep thinking am i just wasting there time over some soreness will let you know how i go on on monday big hugs xx
Posts.Title: breast clinic referal snoozles59 snoozles59

Posts.Content: Sep 27, 2011 01:10AM snoozles59 wrote: Hi saw the BS surgeon this morning , said he could not feel a lump but was concerned about the soreness sent me for a mamagrame and said a letter will come for me to have a US in a couple of days and to come back in 3 weeks as all my results will be back then He also told me to take ibrufen 3 times daily to rule out that it not muscule pain , am trying not to worry now else it will be a long 3 weeks off on my hols on saturday for a week weathers predicted to be nice  so hopefully time will fly by, hope i get US done before i go thanks for listning to me (((( BIG HUGS TO YOU ALL))) Snoozles xxx
Posts.Title: breast clinic referal snoozles59 snoozles59

Posts.Content: snoozles59 wrote: hi all am concerened, and things are moving fast, went to my rumatology apointment on monday mentioned that i had a achy pain in my breast and tender to touch ,has been like this a few weeks the consultant had a look and feel of the area, and told me that i was to see my gp as soon as possible , got a appointment the next day tuesday he asked a few questions as my mum died at 52 same age as me now of breast cancer did a examination, said he could not feel a lump thou said he thought that it was dimpled thou i carnt see anything then said he wasnt sure weather there was redness from his examination or it was there before, asked me if i had felt a lump i said i thought i had a few weeks ago but wasnt sure what i was feeling for  he said i will refer you as a urgent referal and send a fax off later that day .and i should hear within 2 weeks, well first thing this morning i had a phone call from the breast clinic asking me to come in on monday morning early is it always that quick? and i didnt think you had pain with cancer  not sure about all this but feeling more scared as time is going on snoozles Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: breast clinic referal snoozles59 snoozles59

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2011 06:15PM snoozles59 wrote: Hi Alvarez 5 Just to let you know I'm also having pain in my left breast ,had a mamo and yesterday went for a US and was told that there was a suspicious area so now just waiting for my follow up appointment for my results which is is not till the 8Th November so I'm really worried now and its going to be a long 3 weeks so good luck will be thinking of you good luck xx
